entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
